page.title: 05ST.PATRICK'S SCHOOL
page.content: St.Patrick's C of E School was opened in 1816 with only two classes and forty children. We have had many changes over the years, one of which was an assembly hall with a kitchen. Now we have Four classes and 110 children. Our school field's perimeter is 650m. We also have a big playground, its perimeter is 219m.So we are very lucky. We have four classes,a library,a T.V storeroom and music room.We also have a hall and kitchen and two offices. The school bus picks people up at ten past eight then takes them home at three fifteen.Mrs Taylor goes on the bus with them to make sure they sit down and behave. We have many school clubs such as netball,recorders, needlework,guitars, badminton and gymnastics.
